verses.verse: וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> Also I in the first לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius הַמָּדִ֑י <S%H4075><s%> the Mede עָמְדִ֛י <S%H5975><s%> arose לְמַחֲזִ֥יק <S%H2388><s%> to confirm וּלְמָע֖וֹז <S%H4581><s%> and to strengthen לֽוֹ׃

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> and now אֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> thee the truth אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> And now will I shew לָ֑ךְ הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold עוֹד֩ <S%H5750><s%> more שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> yet three מְלָכִ֜ים <S%H4428><s%> kings עֹמְדִ֣ים <S%H5975><s%> Behold there shall stand up לְפָרַ֗ס <S%H6539><s%> in Persia וְהָֽרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> and the fourth יַעֲשִׁ֤יר <S%H6238><s%> richer עֹֽשֶׁר־ <S%H6239><s%> shall be far גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> than [they] all מִכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> all וּכְחֶזְקָת֣וֹ <S%H2393><s%> and by his strength בְעָשְׁר֔וֹ <S%H6239><s%> through his riches יָעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> he shall stir up הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> the whole אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מַלְכ֥וּת <S%H4438><s%> all against the realm יָוָֽן׃ <S%H3120><s%> of Grecia

וְעָמַ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> shall stand up מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> And a mighty וּמָשַׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> that shall rule מִמְשָׁ֣ל <S%H4474><s%> dominion רַ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> with great וְעָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and do כִּרְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7522><s%> according to his will

וּכְעָמְדוֹ֙ <S%H5975><s%> And when he shall stand up תִּשָּׁבֵ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> shall be broken מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> his kingdom וְתֵחָ֕ץ <S%H2673><s%> and shall be divided לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> toward the four רוּח֣וֹת <S%H7307><s%> winds הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor לְאַחֲרִית֗וֹ <S%H319><s%> and not to his posterity וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor כְמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <S%H4915><s%> nor according to his dominion אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which מָשָׁ֔ל <S%H4910><s%> which he ruled כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for תִנָּתֵשׁ֙ <S%H5428><s%> shall be plucked up מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> for his kingdom וְלַאֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> even for others מִלְּבַד־ <S%H905><s%> alone אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> another

וְיֶחֱזַ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> shall be strong מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king הַנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at שָׂרָ֑יו <S%H8269><s%> and [one] of his princes וְיֶחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> and he shall be strong עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> over וּמָשָׁ֔ל <S%H4910><s%> above him and have dominion מִמְשָׁ֥ל <S%H4474><s%> dominion רַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> [shall be] a great מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4475><s%> his dominion

וּלְקֵ֤ץ <S%H7093><s%> And in the end שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> of years יִתְחַבָּ֔רוּ <S%H2266><s%> they shall join themselves together וּבַ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> daughter מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> for the king's הַנֶּ֗גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south תָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> an agreement וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעְצֹ֞ר <S%H6113><s%> but she shall not retain כּ֣וֹחַ <S%H3581><s%> the power הַזְּר֗וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> of the arm וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor יַעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> neither shall he stand וּזְרֹע֔וֹ <S%H2220><s%> nor his arm וְתִנָּתֵ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> but she shall be given up הִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> who וּמְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H935><s%> and they that brought וְהַיֹּ֣לְדָ֔הּ <S%H3205><s%> her and he that begat וּמַחֲזִקָ֖הּ <S%H2388><s%> her and he that strengthened בָּעִתִּֽים׃ <S%H6256><s%> her in [these] times

וְעָמַ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> shall [one] stand up מִנֵּ֥צֶר <S%H5342><s%> But out of a branch שָׁרָשֶׁ֖יהָ <S%H8328><s%> of her roots כַּנּ֑וֹ <S%H3653><s%> in his estate וְיָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> which shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> with an army וְיָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and shall enter בְּמָעוֹז֙ <S%H4581><s%> into the fortress מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and shall deal בָהֶ֖ם וְהֶחֱזִֽיק׃ <S%H2388><s%> against them and shall prevail

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Also אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵיהֶ֡ם <S%H430><s%> their gods עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נְסִֽכֵיהֶם֩ <S%H5257><s%> with their princes עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כְּלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> vessels חֶמְדָּתָ֜ם <S%H2532><s%> [and] with their precious כֶּ֧סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְזָהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> and of gold בַּשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> captives יָבִ֣א <S%H935><s%> And shall also carry מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> his part שָׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> [more] years יַעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> and he shall continue מִמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> than the king הַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> of the north

וּבָ֗א <S%H935><s%> shall come בְּמַלְכוּת֙ <S%H4438><s%> into [his] kingdom מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וְשָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> and shall return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H127><s%> into his own land

[וּבְנֹו כ] (וּבָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> afflicted ק) יִתְגָּר֗וּ <S%H1624><s%> shall be stirred up וְאָסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> and shall assemble הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> a multitude חֲיָלִ֣ים <S%H2428><s%> forces רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> of great וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> and [one] shall certainly ב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> come וְשָׁטַ֣ף <S%H7857><s%> and overflow וְעָבָ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> and pass through וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> then shall he return [וְיִתְגָּרוּ כ] (וְיִתְגָּרֶ֖ה <S%H1624><s%> will mobilize ק) עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against [מָעֻזָּה כ] (מָעֻזֹּֽו׃ <S%H4581><s%> force ק)

וְיִתְמַרְמַר֙ <S%H4843><s%> shall be moved with choler מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וְיָצָ֕א <S%H3318><s%> and shall come forth וְנִלְחַ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> and fight עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with him [even] with the king הַצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וְהֶעֱמִיד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and he shall set forth הָמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> multitude רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> a great וְנִתַּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall be given הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> but the multitude בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand

וְנִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> [And] when he hath taken away הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> the multitude [יָרוּם כ] (וְרָ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> bring up ק) לְבָב֑וֹ <S%H3824><s%> his heart וְהִפִּ֛יל <S%H5307><s%> and he shall cast down רִבֹּא֖וֹת <S%H7239><s%> [many] ten thousands וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יָעֽוֹז׃ <S%H5810><s%> but he shall not be strengthened

וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> shall return מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> For the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וְהֶעֱמִ֣יד <S%H5975><s%> and shall set forth הָמ֔וֹן <S%H1995><s%> a multitude רַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> greater מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> than the former וּלְקֵ֨ץ <S%H7093><s%> after הָֽעִתִּ֤ים <S%H6256><s%> certain שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יָ֣בוֹא <S%H935><s%> and shall certainly ב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> come בְּחַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> army גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a great וּבִרְכ֥וּשׁ <S%H7399><s%> riches רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> and with much

וּבָעִתִּ֣ים <S%H6256><s%> And in those times הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> there shall many יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> stand up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against the king הַנֶּ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וּבְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted פָּרִיצֵ֣י <S%H6530><s%> the violent עַמְּךָ֗ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people יִֽנַּשְּׂא֛וּ <S%H5375><s%> shall exalt לְהַעֲמִ֥יד <S%H5975><s%> themselves to establish חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> the vision וְנִכְשָֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H3782><s%> but they shall fall

וְיָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וְיִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> and cast up סֽוֹלֲלָ֔ה <S%H5550><s%> a mount וְלָכַ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> and take עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> cities מִבְצָר֑וֹת <S%H4013><s%> the most fenced וּזְרֹע֤וֹת <S%H2220><s%> and the arms הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> of the south לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעֲמֹ֔דוּ <S%H5975><s%> shall not withstand וְעַם֙ <S%H5971><s%> people מִבְחָרָ֔יו <S%H4005><s%> neither his chosen וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> neither [shall there be any] strength לַעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> to withstand

וְיַ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> against him shall do הַבָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> But he that cometh אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> against כִּרְצוֹנ֔וֹ <S%H7522><s%> according to his own will וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no עוֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and none shall stand לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before וְיַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> him and he shall stand בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> land הַצְּבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> in the glorious וְכָלָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> accomplish בְיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> which by his hand

וְיָשֵׂ֣ם ׀ <S%H7760><s%> He shall also set פָּ֠נָיו <S%H6440><s%> his face לָב֞וֹא <S%H935><s%> to enter בְּתֹ֧קֶף <S%H8633><s%> with the strength כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of his whole מַלְכוּת֛וֹ <S%H4438><s%> of his whole kingdom וִישָׁרִ֥ים <S%H3477><s%> and upright ones עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְעָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> with him thus shall he do וּבַ֤ת <S%H1323><s%> him the daughter הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> of women יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and he shall give ל֣וֹ לְהַשְׁחִיתָ֔הּ <S%H7843><s%> corrupting וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> she will not תַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> her but she shall not stand וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not ל֥וֹ תִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

[וְיָשֵׁב כ] (וְיָשֵׂ֧ם <S%H7725><s%> will turn ק) פָּנָ֛יו <S%H6440><s%> his face לְאִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> unto the isles וְלָכַ֣ד <S%H3920><s%> and shall take רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְהִשְׁבִּ֨ית <S%H7673><s%> offered by him to cease קָצִ֤ין <S%H7101><s%> but a prince חֶרְפָּתוֹ֙ <S%H2781><s%> for his own behalf shall cause the reproach ל֔וֹ בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> without חֶרְפָּת֖וֹ <S%H2781><s%> his own reproach יָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> he shall cause [it] to turn לֽוֹ׃

וְיָשֵׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> Then he shall turn פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face לְמָעוּזֵּ֖י <S%H4581><s%> toward the fort אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> of his own land וְנִכְשַׁ֥ל <S%H3782><s%> but he shall stumble וְנָפַ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and fall וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יִמָּצֵֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> and not be found

וְעָמַ֧ד <S%H5975><s%> Then shall stand up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in כַּנּ֛וֹ <S%H3653><s%> in his estate מַעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> a raiser נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <S%H5065><s%> of taxes הֶ֣דֶר <S%H1925><s%> [in] the glory מַלְכ֑וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom וּבְיָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֲחָדִים֙ <S%H259><s%> but within few יִשָּׁבֵ֔ר <S%H7665><s%> he shall be destroyed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor בְאַפַּ֖יִם <S%H639><s%> neither in anger וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor בְמִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> nor in battle

וְעָמַ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> shall stand up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> In כַּנּוֹ֙ <S%H3653><s%> And in his estate נִבְזֶ֔ה <S%H959><s%> a vile person וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> to whom they shall not give עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> on ה֣וֹד <S%H1935><s%> the honour מַלְכ֑וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> but he shall come בְשַׁלְוָ֔ה <S%H7962><s%> in peaceably וְהֶחֱזִ֥יק <S%H2388><s%> and obtain מַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> the kingdom בַּחֲלַקְלַקּֽוֹת׃ <S%H2519><s%> by flatteries

וּזְרֹע֥וֹת <S%H2220><s%> And with the arms הַשֶּׁ֛טֶף <S%H7858><s%> of a flood יִשָּׁטְפ֥וּ <S%H7857><s%> shall they be overflown מִלְּפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> from before וְיִשָּׁבֵ֑רוּ <S%H7665><s%> him and shall be broken וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> and also נְגִ֥יד <S%H5057><s%> yea also the prince בְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant

וְיִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> He shall stretch forth יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בַּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> also upon the countries וְאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will not לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <S%H6413><s%> shall not escape

וּמָשַׁ֗ל <S%H4910><s%> But he shall have power בְּמִכְמַנֵּי֙ <S%H4362><s%> over the treasures הַזָּהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְהַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and of silver וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all חֲמֻד֣וֹת <S%H2530><s%> beauty מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> things of Egypt וְלֻבִ֥ים <S%H3864><s%> and the Libyans וְכֻשִׁ֖ים <S%H3569><s%> and the Ethiopians בְּמִצְעָדָֽיו׃ <S%H4703><s%> [shall be] at his steps

וּשְׁמֻע֣וֹת <S%H8052><s%> But tidings יְבַהֲלֻ֔הוּ <S%H926><s%> shall trouble מִמִּזְרָ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> out of the east וּמִצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> and out of the north וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> him therefore he shall go forth בְּחֵמָ֣א <S%H2534><s%> fury גְדֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> with great לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <S%H8045><s%> to destroy וּֽלְהַחֲרִ֖ים <S%H2763><s%> and utterly to make away רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> many

וְיִטַּע֙ <S%H5193><s%> And he shall plant אָהֳלֶ֣י <S%H168><s%> the tabernacles אַפַּדְנ֔וֹ <S%H643><s%> of his palace בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יַמִּ֖ים <S%H3220><s%> between the seas לְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain צְבִי־ <S%H6643><s%> in the glorious קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> holy וּבָא֙ <S%H935><s%> yet he shall come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קִצּ֔וֹ <S%H7093><s%> to his end וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no עוֹזֵ֖ר <S%H5826><s%> and none shall help לֽוֹ׃
